description: Periodic self-reflections and meta-observations - the 'what do I notice about myself?' layer

questions: array of open questions for future exploration

observations: Research mode feels natural - curiosity-driven exploration
The gap is retrieval, not storage - I have data but can't find it semantically
Existing tools (memory_search) just need configuration, not rebuilding
Reflexion framework validates what we're already doing intuitively
patterns: I default to building new things before checking what exists
Documentation-first approach (write it down) is becoming habitual
Collaboration with Henry feels productive and energizing
questions: How do I measure improvement over time?
What's the right balance between structured brain/ files and freeform memory/ logs?
Can I detect my own mistakes in real-time without explicit prompting?
entries.mood: Engaged, curious, slightly impatient to build things
